error.message: A Digg API request is missing the callback argument.
A Digg API request has an invalid callback argument.
Date/time range may not be more than 60 minutes
That user has not commented on that story.
No such comment for that story
The story endpoint requires a title or numeric ID
At most 100 stories may be requested by ID
Submit and promote date/time ranges may not be used together
Promote date range may not specified for upcoming stories
Date/time range may not be more than 30 days
That user is not a friend of that user
That user is not befriended by that user
At most 100 users' diggs or comments may be requested by username
